text:
V: Excuse me, could you tell me the way to Belarusian State University?
S: Sure! Im just going there.
V: Its cool! May I go with you? * nod * Are you a student of the university?
S: Yes, Im a third-year student. And what about you?
V: Me too. But Im only first-year student. Could you tell me something about our alma mater?
***
Phone calls
***
S: Yes. Yes. Yes. Ok Sorry but I have somewhere I need to be right now. To get to BSU follow this road for 1 km and then take a second turn on the left.
V: Thank you! Lets exchange phone numbers so well talk about the university.
S: Yea, good idea! Here is my number.
V: Here is mine. See you.
S: Good bye!
